titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on nonbenzenoid vinyl acetate-vinyl chloride-ethylene terpolymer, containing by eight less than 50 percent derivatives of vinyl acetate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on nonbenzenoid vinyl acetate-vinyl chloride-ethylene terpolymer containing by weight less than 50 percent derivatives of vinyl acetate.
